ca.cmput301.team13.taskman
Class TaskListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ca.cmput301.team13.taskman.TaskListAdapter

public class TaskListAdapter
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a list of tasks from the VirtualRepository to list views.
